channel.title: How do i take out donator option?
channel.description:
i was just wondering how to take the donator option out of my server. I have a shop that says youmust be a donator to access it but i would like it gone please help. :confused:
i was also wondering how to fix items i have some phats and santas that when you click to wear them they go into the wepon slot can you please help me on this too. thanks
thanks smerf45.

item.title: How do i take out donator option?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

[quote=“demonlover14, post:4, topic:338038”][quote author=smerf45 link=topic=434436.msg3190023#msg3190023 date=1272155022]
alright sorry i just needed help with this cuz i couldnt figure it out. thanks though :).

how do i totally take the donator option out ? cuz i dont want it at all
[/quote]
Remove anything that has to do with donator rights in your config folder, client.java and thats about it.[/quote]

There wouldn’t be anything to do with accessing a shop only if you’re a donator in the config folder, you’d find that in client.java.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i take out donator option?

item.title: How do i take out donator option?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Put the items that you want to equip right in the correct category in item.java. In client.java find the shop number and change it so you don’t have to be donator and please do not post your topic more than once.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i take out donator option?
